trans-unit.source: Implements a selectable item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 선택 가능한 항목을 구현 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: TreeViewItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: TreeViewItem이는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, 즉 헤더와 개체의 컬렉션 (예: 문자열, 이미지 또는 패널) 형식일 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> 를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: TreeViewItem controls can be embedded inside other TreeViewItem controls to create a hierarchy of nodes inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: TreeViewItem 컨트롤 내에 노드 계층 구조를 만드는 다른 TreeViewItem 컨트롤 내에 포함 될 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a hierarchy of TreeViewItem controls inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> 안에 TreeViewItem 컨트롤의 계층 구조를 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: ![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") To expand or collapse a TreeViewItem, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![TreeView 설명](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView 설명") 를 확장 하거나 축소 TreeViewItem는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>제어, 참조는 [TreeView 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the TreeViewItem Control To apply the same property settings to multiple TreeViewItem controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 여러 개의 TreeViewItem 컨트롤을 사용 하 여 동일한 속성 설정을 적용할는 TreeViewItem 컨트롤을 사용자 지정의 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 수정할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>고유한 모양을 제어할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 만들기에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, 참조 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the TreeViewItem, see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 부분 및는 TreeViewItem 관련 된 상태를 보려면 참조 [TreeView 스타일 및 템플릿](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [기본 WPF 테마](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in TreeViewItem control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 시각적 속성을 설정만 영향을 미칠 속성 시각적 TreeViewItem 컨트롤의 기본 서식 파일에 속성이 있으며를 사용 하 여 설정 된 경우는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: "변경의 시각적 구조의 정도 제어" 섹션의 시각적 속성 목록을 찾을 수 있습니다 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠를 정렬 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 부모 내의 마지막 영역 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> 자신과 자식을 정렬 하는 데 사용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual size used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 실제 크기는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded*> property changes from <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded*>속성이에서 변경 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 를 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> is collapsed so that child elements are hidden.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트가 발생할 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>은 축소 되어 자식 요소를 숨깁니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded"> </xref> 라우트된 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Expands the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> control and all its child <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: 확장 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> 컨트롤과 모든 자식 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> to use to display the object.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> 를 사용 하는 개체를 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> to use to display the object.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> 를 사용 하는 개체를 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the nested items in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> are expanded or collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나 있는지 여부를 중첩 된 항목에는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> 확장 되거나 축소 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the button that expands and collapses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> is expanded or collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 확장 및 축소 하는 단추의 모양을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>때 변경 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>확장 또는 축소.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: When the IsExpanded property value changes from `true` to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: IsExpanded 속성 값에서 변경 될 때 `true` 를 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded> event occurs when the IsExpanded property value changes from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로,는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded>IsExpanded 속성 값에서 변경 될 때 이벤트 발생 `false` 를 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded>

trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the IsSelected property value changes to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: IsSelected 속성 값으로 변경 되 면 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected>

trans-unit.source: When the IsSelected property value changes to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Unselected> event occurs.

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard changes focus from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, the value of this property remains `true`.
trans-unit.target: 키보드 변경 내용에서 집중 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>,이 속성 값은 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` and collapses or expands the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> when one of the following keys is pressed: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 설정 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>를 `true` 축소 하거나 확장 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>다음 키 중 하나를 누르면:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key></xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> is two, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> property switches to `true` or `false`, which causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> to expand or collapse.
trans-unit.target: 경우 마우스 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>는&2;의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A>속성으로 전환 `true` 또는 `false`,으로 구독이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>확장 하거나 축소 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>이벤트를 설정 하 여 처리 된 것으로 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>에 이벤트 데이터의 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: The event data.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the owning <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> should virtualize its items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 소유 하 고 있는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> 해당 항목을 가상화 해야, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected*> property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> changes from <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected*>속성은 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> 에서 변경 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 를 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: The event occurs when the selection changes from this <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> to another <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 선택이 변경 될 때 이벤트 발생 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>다른 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This event is related to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged> event that occurs when there is a change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는 관련이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged>에 변경 될 때 발생 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged>
